text: Oh nina enikholwayo! Noma ngabe ngubani kunina obuyela emumva ayeke inkolo yakhe (yobu Islam) ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi uyoletha abantu ayobathanda nabo bamthande, ukuzithoba kwabakholwayo, amandla okubhekana nabangakholwa, bazabalaza endleleni kaMvelinqangi futhi abesabiukugxekwaabagxeki, lokhokungumusakaMvelinqangi uwunika lowo amthandayo futhi uMvelinqangi ungamele konke uyazi
